"<%me>, are you supposed to be here?": "By the way, you and Xiao have been up to something recently, haven't you? He won't tell me anything."
"Well, thanks to that I've had plenty of free time, so it's not like I'm complaining or anything."
"Oh, speak of the devil, it's Xiao... HUH!? Why the hell would I be jealous!? You jerk!!"
"O-oh, n-nothing! It's nothing!!"
"Screaming 'nothing!' over and over isn't all that convincing now, is it?"
"Okay. Now <%me> should be able to see me too."
"Sara, I leave the explanation to you."
"...this pain in the ass follows me everywhere. Can you understand how I feel?"
"Well excuse me, princess. Isn't that putting yourself down, since we're practically the same?"
"Like hell we are! You're just freeloading off of me!"
"1. What's going on here?"
"2. You two get along well"
"That's...uh... ugh, I guess I can tell you."
"It's terrible. It's like I drew the short end of the stick."
"...when I was young, I nearly died. That was when it happened."
"Nearly died? That's quite the understatement. It was practically a miracle you were still breathing."
"I gave you a part of myself to sustain you, and it saved your life."
"Quit the hero act! I remember clearly when you said 'Perfect, I always wanted a minion!'"
"Oh yeah, that happened... anyway! If you were to think of it as a piece of me is inside Sara, you wouldn't be wrong."
"So when you see her mumbling to herself, please understand that she's only half crazy."
"You see that?? It's like having the comm link left permanently open. What an absolute pain."
"...well, it's not like I'm not grateful he saved my life or anything..."

"Oh no! He heard that!
Xiao, you're so noisy!"
